definitions.definition: Making active and effective ; bringing into a state of activity.
The process of making a radioisotope by bombarding a stable element with neutrons or protons .
The process by which molecules are made able to react.
The promotion of a brand through an event or campaign .
examples: using shopper activation to convert shoppers into buyers

main_definition: Making active and effective ; bringing into a state of activity.
secondary_definitions: ( physics ) The process of making a radioisotope by bombarding a stable element with neutrons or protons .
( biochemistry ) The process by which molecules are made able to react.
( marketing ) The promotion of a brand through an event or campaign .
